metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14291 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an out of bounds read inthe function GfxPatchMeshShading::parse at GfxState.cc for typeA==6 case 3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt6-3 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler126 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
ipe package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
